title: CV Schema
description: A standard CV format that addresses the requirements of most common applicant's information.

languageCode.description: The language used in the CV, identified by its four-letter code according to the IETF language tag specification. The code is composed of an ISO 639-1 or 639-2 language code, followed by an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code, separated by a hyphen (e.g., en-US for English spoken in the United States, fr-CA for French spoken in Canada). Please refer to the IETF language tag specification for more information.

imageLink.description: A link to the applicant's profile picture.

name.description: The full name of the applicant.

title.description: A brief title describing the applicant's professional expertise.

url.description: A URL to a website associated with the applicant.

type.description: The type of website (e.g., Blog, Personal, Portfolio, Professional Profile).

websites.description: A list of websites associated with the applicant.

institution.description: The name of the educational institution.

degree.description: The degree obtained or the program pursued at the institution.

fieldOfStudy.description: The field of study for the educational program.

startDate.description: The start date of the educational program.

endDate.description: This field can be null if the position is ongoing, and can also contain partial dates (e.g., '2012-04' for April 2012).

description.description: A brief description of the program, including skills acquired.

honors.description: Honors, awards, or distinctions received during the educational program.

value.description: The numeric value of the score.

unit.description: The unit of the score (e.g. GPA, percentile, etc.).

education.description: A list of the applicant's educational history.

proficiency.description: The level of proficiency in the language (e.g., Elementary, Limited Working, Professional, Native or Bilingual).

languages.description: A list of languages spoken by the applicant and their proficiency levels.

level.description: The proficiency level of the skill (e.g., Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced, Expert).

skills.description: A list of the applicant's technical and professional skills.

description.description: A brief description of the employer, including industry and size.

website.description: A link to the employer's website.

endDate.description: The end date of employment or null if still employed.

duration.description: The duration of the employment (e.g., 2 years 3 months).

title.description: The title of the position held by the applicant.

type.description: The type of employment (e.g., Full-time, Part-time, Contract, Internship).

location.description: The location of the position, including city and country.

duration.description: The duration of the position (e.g., 2 years 3 months).

startDate.description: The start date of the position.

endDate.description: The end date of the position or null if currently employed.

description.description: A description of the applicant's responsibilities and achievements in the position.

locationType.description: The work arrangement for the position (e.g., On-site, Remote, Hybrid).

skills.description: A list of skills and technologies used in the position.

positions.description: A list of positions held by the applicant at the company.

experience.description: A list of the applicant's work experience.

about.description: A brief summary of the applicant's professional background and career goals.

organization.description: The organization that issued the certification.

dateObtained.description: The date the certification was obtained.

expirationDate.description: The expiration date of the certification, if applicable.

id.description: The identification number or code for the certification, if applicable (e.g., License number, Certificate number).

url.description: A URL to verify the certification, if available.

certifications.description: A list of the applicant's certifications and licenses.

description.description: A brief description of the project, including goals, technologies used, and outcomes.

url.description: A URL to view the project, if available (e.g., GitHub repository, Portfolio page).

startDate.description: The start date of the project.

endDate.description: The end date of the project or null if the project is still in progress.

projects.description: A list of the applicant's personal or professional projects.

partial-date.description: A partial date that can be in the format 'YYYY', 'YYYY-MM', or 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

stateProvince.description: The name of the state or region.

city.description: The name of the city or town.

postalCode.description: The postal code or ZIP code of the address.

addressLine1.description: The first line of the street address.

addressLine2.description: The second line of the street address.
